channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260113)
item.description:
What's New

fix: Vietnamese vowel transformation and English detection improvements

  • Fix insertAOE() to correctly update ALL vowels when TONEW_MASK is removed

(e.g., 'cươi' + 'o' now correctly becomes 'cuôi' instead of 'cưôi')

  • Allow consonant+w patterns in Telex/Simple Telex 2 input types

(e.g., 'hw' → 'hư', 'bw' → 'bư' are valid Vietnamese transformations)

  • Only treat consonant+w as English patterns in VNI and Simple Telex 1
  • Refactor VNEngineTests to validate engine buffer state instead of output
  • Update README.md with current feature documentation
  • Bump version in Info.plist

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
